entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
